refnamediv.refpurpose: Query or select the DV preset of the current input or output

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: To query and select the current DV preset, applications use the VIDIOC_G_DV_PRESET and VIDIOC_S_DV_PRESET ioctls which take a pointer to a &v4l2-dv-preset; type as argument. Applications must zero the reserved array in &v4l2-dv-preset;. VIDIOC_G_DV_PRESET returns a dv preset in the field preset of &v4l2-dv-preset;.
